attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: David Chaytor MP has been shown to be a thoroughly dishonourable person. He persuaded his daughter to lie on his behalf, so that he could gain financial benefit at the tax payers expense. This amounts to an abuse of his position as a member of parliament, and warrants instant dismissal, and the loss of his pension rights.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
